message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of it. However, considering my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $950,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While I recognize your budget constraints, the value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000.  I believe this is a fair compromise that reflects the true worth of what's being offered.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I must stick to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,000,000. This is the maximum amount I can afford at this time.
